trans-unit.source: Register current user for push notifications using a mobile service | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Register current user for push notifications using a mobile service | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to request push notification registration in an iOS app with Azure Notification Hubs when registeration is performed by Azure Mobile Services.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to request push notification registration in an iOS app with Azure Notification Hubs when registeration is performed by Azure Mobile Services.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>AZURE.SELECTOR[windows store c#]</linkText><title></title>(notification-hubs-windows-store-mobile-services-register-user-push-notifications.md) <linkText>iOS</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>AZURE.SELECTOR[windows store c#]</linkText><title></title>(notification-hubs-windows-store-mobile-services-register-user-push-notifications.md) <linkText>iOS</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: This topic shows you how to request push notification registration with Azure Notification Hubs when registration is performed by Azure Mobile Services.
trans-unit.target: This topic shows you how to request push notification registration with Azure Notification Hubs when registration is performed by Azure Mobile Services.

trans-unit.source: This topic extends the tutorial [Notify users with Notification Hubs].
trans-unit.target: This topic extends the tutorial [Notify users with Notification Hubs].

trans-unit.source: You must have already completed the required steps in that tutorial to create the authenticated mobile service.
trans-unit.target: You must have already completed the required steps in that tutorial to create the authenticated mobile service.

trans-unit.source: For more information on the notify users scenario, see [Notify users with Notification Hubs].
trans-unit.target: For more information on the notify users scenario, see [Notify users with Notification Hubs].

trans-unit.source: In Xcode, open the QSTodoService.h file in the project that you created when you completed the prerequisite tutorial [Get started with authentication], and add the following deviceToken property:
trans-unit.target: In Xcode, open the QSTodoService.h file in the project that you created when you completed the prerequisite tutorial [Get started with authentication], and add the following deviceToken property:

trans-unit.source: This property stores the device token.
trans-unit.target: This property stores the device token.

trans-unit.source: In the QSTodoService.m file, add the following getDeviceTokenInHex method:
trans-unit.target: In the QSTodoService.m file, add the following getDeviceTokenInHex method:

trans-unit.source: This method converts the device token to a hex string value.
trans-unit.target: This method converts the device token to a hex string value.

trans-unit.source: In the QSAppDelegate.m file, add the following lines of code to the didFinishLaunchingWithOptions method:
trans-unit.target: In the QSAppDelegate.m file, add the following lines of code to the didFinishLaunchingWithOptions method:

trans-unit.source: This enables push notifications in your app.
trans-unit.target: This enables push notifications in your app.

trans-unit.source: In the QSAppDelegate.m file, add the following method:
trans-unit.target: In the QSAppDelegate.m file, add the following method:

trans-unit.source: This updates the deviceToken property.
trans-unit.target: This updates the deviceToken property.

trans-unit.source: At this point, there should not be any other code in this method.
trans-unit.target: At this point, there should not be any other code in this method.

trans-unit.source: If you already have a call to the registerNativeWithDeviceToken method that was added when you completed the Get Started with Notification Hubs tutorial, you must comment-out or remove that call.
trans-unit.target: If you already have a call to the registerNativeWithDeviceToken method that was added when you completed the Get Started with Notification Hubs tutorial, you must comment-out or remove that call.

trans-unit.source: (Optional) In the QSAppDelegate.m file, add the following handler method:
trans-unit.target: (Optional) In the QSAppDelegate.m file, add the following handler method:

trans-unit.source: This method displays an alert in the UI when your app receives notifications while it is running.
trans-unit.target: This method displays an alert in the UI when your app receives notifications while it is running.

trans-unit.source: In the QSTodoListViewController.m file, add the registerForNotificationsWithBackEnd method:
trans-unit.target: In the QSTodoListViewController.m file, add the registerForNotificationsWithBackEnd method:

trans-unit.source: This method constructs a json payload that contains the device token.
trans-unit.target: This method constructs a json payload that contains the device token.

trans-unit.source: It then calls the custom API in your Mobile Service to register for notification.
trans-unit.target: It then calls the custom API in your Mobile Service to register for notification.

trans-unit.source: This method creates a device token for push notifications and sends it, along with the device type, to the custom API method that creates a registration in Notification Hubs.
trans-unit.target: This method creates a device token for push notifications and sends it, along with the device type, to the custom API method that creates a registration in Notification Hubs.

trans-unit.source: This custom API was defined in [Notify users with Notification Hubs].
trans-unit.target: This custom API was defined in [Notify users with Notification Hubs].

trans-unit.source: Finally, in the viewDidAppear method, add a call to this the new registerForNotificationsWithBackEnd method after the user successfully authenticates, as in the following example:
trans-unit.target: Finally, in the viewDidAppear method, add a call to this the new registerForNotificationsWithBackEnd method after the user successfully authenticates, as in the following example:

trans-unit.source: This makes sure that registration is requested every time that the page is loaded.
trans-unit.target: This makes sure that registration is requested every time that the page is loaded.

trans-unit.source: In your app, you may only want to make this registration periodically to ensure that the registration is current.
trans-unit.target: In your app, you may only want to make this registration periodically to ensure that the registration is current.

trans-unit.source: Now that the client app has been updated, return to the [Notify users with Notification Hubs] and update the mobile service to send notifications by using Notification Hubs.
trans-unit.target: Now that the client app has been updated, return to the [Notify users with Notification Hubs] and update the mobile service to send notifications by using Notification Hubs.
